name: adr-support
description: Automatic Architecture Decision Record (ADR) management with decision detection, lifecycle tracking, templates, and integration with OpenSpec and Beads workflows

steps: Create adr/ directory in project root
Enable ADR detection and automation features

decision_detection.description: Automatic detection of architectural decisions from code changes and conversations

adr_creation.description: Automated ADR creation with template selection and metadata generation

lifecycle_management.description: Track ADR lifecycle: draft → proposed → approved → implemented → maintained → superseded/sunset

validation.description: Validate ADR completeness, status transitions, and references

openspec_integration.description: Link ADRs to OpenSpec specifications with coordination manifest updates

beads_integration.description: Create and link Beads tasks for ADR implementation

conflict_detection.description: Detect contradictory decisions and suggest resolutions

review_scheduling.description: Schedule and conduct ADR reviews after implementation

contents: rules/decision-detection.md - How AI agents detect architectural decisions

rules/lifecycle-management.md - ADR lifecycle and status transitions
rules/template-selection.md - Template selection logic and guidelines
rules/validation.md - ADR validation and completeness checks
